actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to reimburse producers for losses suffered as a result of the closing of Corporation licensed and approved grain warehouses or elevators, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Inventory Grain Protection Act of 1990 - Requires the Commodity Credit Corporation to reimburse producers for losses suffered as a result of the closing of Corporation licensed or approved grain warehouses or elevators.

titles.title: A bill to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to reimburse producers for losses suffered as a result of the closing of Corporation licensed and approved grain warehouses or elevators, and for other purposes.
